---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version: 1.0.1
Date: 2020-08-28
  Changes:
    - Added an option to set what additional items are given on respawn (admin only can change this)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version: 1.0.0
Date: 2020-08-28
  Changes:
    - Removed deathcounter code and made 'Death_Counter' an external mod dependency
    - Added setting to allow increasing Spawn delay timerwith each death, with cooldown value to reduce it back to normal over time.
    - Added setting to allow the adjustment of the damage tint applied to the screen when being attacked
    - Added setting to allow the speed at which healing occurs
    - Added setting to control how quickly healing kicks in after combat is over
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version: 0.3.0
Date: 14. 08. 2020
  Changes:
    - Some checks needed after 1.0.0 was released
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version: 0.1.2
Date: 14. 03. 2020
  Changes:
    - Added some support for Krastorio2 ammo / guns
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version: 0.1.1
Date: 08. 03. 2020
  Changes :
    - Added a death counter along with a breakdown by cause
    - /DeathCountStats to get a report
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version: 0.1.0
Date: 22. 01. 2020
  Changes :
    - Support 0.18
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version: 0.0.7
Date: 2020-01-05
  Features:
  Changes:
    - Dependency on STDLIB removed
    - Used .luacheckrc to do some code syntax checks to make Muppet happy.
    - Added some commands triggers for debugging purposes
  Bug fixes:
  Info:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version: 0.0.6
Date: 2020-01-03
  Features:
  Changes:
    - Some fixes for JD Jan map, while I do some rewrites.
  Bug fixes:
  Info:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version: 0.0.4
Date: 2019-11-01
  Features:
  Changes:
  Bug fixes:
    - Messages still repeating when they shouldnt (still)
  Info:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version: 0.0.3
Date: 2019-11-01
  Features:
  Changes:
  Bug fixes:
    - Messages still repeating when they shouldnt
  Info:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version: 0.0.2
Date: 2019-11-01
  Features:
  Changes:
  Bug fixes:
    - Repeating a message every minute,  not when the condition has changed.
  Info:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version: 0.0.1
Date: 2019-10-26
  Features:
    - Tracks guns / ammo / armor produced by players force and once threshold is reached players
      will be spawned with highest tier after death
    - There are primary and secondary guns and ammo that are tracked
  Changes:
  Bug fixes:
  Info:
